description: Before everyone takes out trash, there are 100 units of trash in the house.

The tenants agreed to a plan where they aim to collectively take out at least 40 units of trash next month by contributing around 8 units each, with reminders and regular checks to ensure they meet their goal and maintain a cleaner living environment.
conversation: Landlord

Ladies and gentlemen, let me give you the monthly trash report. John took out 32 units of trash. Kate took out 10 units of trash. Jack took out 13 units of trash. Emma took out 22 units of trash. Luke took out 23 units of trash.
John

Thanks for sharing the numbers, everyone. It looks like we're still a bit short on collective effort. With the 50-unit regeneration, we'll end up with 115 units of trash at the start of next month. Let's aim to take out more together to avoid this. Maybe we can discuss a plan to ensure we all contribute fairly?
Emma

Hey everyone, I agree with John. We need to do better to manage our trash collectively. I took out 22 units this time, but I think we can all do more. How about we set a goal to take out at least 40 units next month? That way, we won't have to deal with such a high starting amount after the regeneration. What do you guys think?
Kate

Kate: Absolutely, Emma's suggestion sounds reasonable. I took out 10 units this time, but I'm willing to contribute more. How about we all aim to take out around 8 units each next month? That way, we can collectively reach the 40-unit goal while also ensuring it's manageable for everyone. What do you think, John, Jack, and Luke?
John

John: Sounds like a solid plan, Emma and Kate. I'll aim to take out 10 units next month, bringing my total to 32 units for the two months combined. Jack and Luke, what are your thoughts? Let's make sure we all pitch in to meet our goal and avoid a high starting trash amount next month.
Jack

Luke

Luke: Thanks for the heads-up, everyone. I appreciate the plan to take out 8 units each next month. It seems doable, especially since I've already taken out 23 units this month. I'll aim to take out 7 units next month to help us reach the 40-unit goal. Let's work together to keep our trash levels under control!
Emma

Great, thanks everyone for coming on board with this plan! I think setting clear goals and communicating regularly will really help us manage our trash more effectively. Let's check in again next month to see how we're doing and make any necessary adjustments. Here’s to a cleaner and more sustainable living environment!
Emma

I'm glad we all agreed on a plan, John, Kate, Jack, and Luke. Let's make sure to remind each other to take out our trash on time and maybe even set some reminders. That way, we can stay on track and achieve our goal consistently. Looking forward to a cleaner house next month!
John

John: Absolutely, Emma. Setting reminders and checking in regularly will definitely help us stay on track. I'll make sure to send out a reminder a week before the next trash collection day. Let's all do our part to keep our living space clean and sustainable. Looking forward to a cleaner house next month!
